summary:
Creative Content Creator fluent in English and Spanish with 3+ years of experience generating content for the largest and most recognized magazine in Ecuador within the fields of fashion, design, lifestyle and current events. 

Former Independent Community Manager and Digital Content Creator for various brands, including an interior design firm, two consumer-packaged-goods companies, and a start-up from the USA.

Italian / Ecuadorian dual citizen currently looking for opportunities in the Netherlands involving creative content creation, communication and social media management.

Have a look at my portfolio here: https://shorturl.at/adjsK

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 2137878, 'name': 'Revista COSAS', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHsQAczJULmQw/company-logo_400_400/0/1519885693439?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=1I3iadt9RHdt1JV9wGqPAcj-2njGBcGc1n1JBAID7wU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/revista-cosas/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Quito, Pichincha, Ecuador (Remote)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'Revista COSAS', 'description': 'Wrote and published 400+ original articles for the digital magazine of COSAS with the aim to entertain and inform an audience of 52K+ followers through content of a varied thematic including fine art, fashion, photography, trends, current (global) events, pop culture, and news involving celebrities, politicians & European royalty.

Generated and posted 500+ content pieces for the magazine ́s social media accounts (Facebook, Instagram & TikTok) through the use of digital images & videos that came from the team ́s production teams / online databases.

Engaged new viewers and readers to the magazine by generating and editing digital content like photography and videos using Adobe Photoshop, Final Cut Pro, Canva, Animoto and CapCut.

Wrote and edited original copy for multiple digital materials, including social media posts, website publications, email campaigns, and paid advertising for the magazine and its clients (Coca-Cola, H&M, Diners Club and more).', 'title': 'Digital Editor, Content Creator & Community Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 11380957, 'name': 'Waku', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQE1OnBXEapsfw/company-logo_400_400/0/1647894822527?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=yl9Py0HYGmM4qJz3M-2L2rjw1jMKcyxbMmyQQYGVgcA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/waku-inc/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Boston, Massachusetts, Estados Unidos', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'Waku', 'description': "Closed 22 influencer marketing deals with independent social media figures from 15+ states around the USA with the objective of increasing the brand´s audience without any expenses aside from product giveaways and shipping.

Generated traffic to the company's website by writing 3 weekly articles on topics related to wellness, gut health, yoga, benefits of consuming Waku, recipes and more.", 'title': 'Influencer Marketing', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': '4studio Diseño Interior', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Quito, Pichincha, Ecuador', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': '4studio Diseño Interior', 'description': 'Structured and improved the studio´s digital presence and communication strategy by creating and publishing a social media campaign calendar that inspired and encouraged viewers to understand the value behind their aesthetic design and hire their services.

Generated a carefully planned, constant stream of content for the studio´s social media accounts that included 75 monthly stories, 15 monthly formal publications, and interactions with its community via DMs and comments', 'title': 'Digital Content Creator, Planner & Community Manager', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 22341632, 'name': 'Colegio Menor Quito', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFC9pdSaDbFLA/company-logo_400_400/0/1662768903238?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=ZySN_imwcecEDJ7F75u4STGMMKBAbzTeNdVr2MgHvnk', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/colegiomenoruio/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Quito, Ecuador', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Colegio Menor Quito', 'description': 'Won 24 soccer championships by leading, motivating and generating game strategies for 3 groups of 18 players of different age groups (Freshman, Sophomores, juniors and Seniors).

Planned 600+ training sessions, 10 championships and created a system to measure the results of each player as they progressed throughout the academic year.

Thought my students the techniques required to become good soccer players and the correct form to perform specific moves, passes, kicks and more.', 'title': 'Assistant High School Soccer Coach', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 3352725, 'name': 'MARURI', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQE4bKwUVEqQHQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519911174031?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=wGghHx3BwjUfAFhCJTwCUPRfEKAI9RdRaJqlwS-CCrs', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/maruri/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Quito, Ecuador', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'MARURI', 'description': 'Executed and updated a database of more than 200 journalists and media outlets in the country.

Developed various communication and PR strategies for four different clients, including press conferences, interviews, industry and community events, among others.

Wrote 40+ press releases for them to be published in different media outlets (written press, radio and television) and followed up on them by calling the journalist and advocate for each client.

Managed to accomplish 30+ news publications for our clients in various media outlets of the country (written press, radio and television).', 'title': 'PR Assistant', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}]
